title.rendered: India vs West Indies Head-to-Head Stats, Records in ODIs

content.rendered:
India vs West Indies is one of the most exciting rivalries in the ODI format. India is leading the current ODI series by 2-0 under the captaincy of Shikhar Dhawan. Let’s look at their head-to-head ODI stats in detail:

India vs West Indies ODI Head-to-Head Record

The overall ODI head-to-head comparison shows the minimal difference between the teams. India lead West Indies by just 6 matches.

  • ODI played: 138
  • India Won: 69
  • West Indies Won: 63
  • India Lost: 63
  • West Indies Lost: 69
  • India Win %: 52.23%
  • West Indies Win %: 47.76%
  • Tied: 2
  • No Results 4

India vs West Indies ODI Head-to-Head Record in Last 4 years:

In the last 4 years, India and West Indies have played 17 ODIs against each other. In recent years India have dominated the West Indies. India have won 13 games, whereas West Indies have managed only two victories.

  • ODI played: 17
  • India Won: 13
  • West Indies Won: 2
  • India Lost: 2
  • West Indies Lost: 13
  • India Win %: 76.47%
  • West Indies Win %: 11.76%
  • Tied: 1
  • No Results 1

Most Runs Scored in India vs West Indies ODIs

Virat Kohli is the leading run-scorer between the teams with 2,261 runs. He scored these runs at a whopping average of 66.50! He is followed by Rohit Sharma(1601 runs) and Sachin Tendulkar(1573 runs).

Most Wickets Taken in India vs West Indies ODIs

Courtney Walsh, with 44 wickets, is the leading wicket-taker in the ODIs between India and West Indies. Amongst the active players, Ravindra Jadeja is the leading wicket-taker with 41 wickets.

Also Read: West Indies vs India 1st ODI: Fantasy Cricket Tips

Highest Team Total in India vs West Indies ODIs:

India scored 418/5 against West Indies on 8th December 2011 at Indore.

Lowest Team Total in India vs West Indies ODIs:

India was bowled out for 100 runs on 16 Nov 1993 at Ahmedabad

Highest individual score in India vs West Indies ODIs:

India’s former opening batter Virendra Sehwag scored 219 runs against West Indies at Indore on 8th December 2011

Best Bowling Figures in India vs West Indies ODIs:

Anil Kumble took 6 wickets for 12 runs against West Indies at Kolkata on 27th November 1993.

Ready to pick your team for India vs West Indies matches? Download the fantasy cricket app now!

Advantages of Playing Fantasy Cricket on My11circle.

*Stats updated till 25th July 2022
